IP Address of Custom DNS Server
This will set a custom DNS server or use Azure Fabric DNS (not Azure DNS service). Pick either azuredns or customdns. This is Case Sensitive.
Number of highly available shards to create in the cluster. Requires Premium SKU. Set to 0 to not set up clustering.
The size of the new Azure Redis Cache instance. Valid family and capacity combinations are (C0..C6, P1..P4).
The name of the App Service plan to use for hosting the web app.
The name of the App Service plan to use for hosting the web app.
Set to the root internal domain name to associate with this ASP.
Set this to the root domain associated with the Web App.
0 = public VIP only, 1 = only ports 80/443 are mapped to ILB VIP, 2 = only FTP ports are mapped to ILB VIP, 3 = both ports 80/443 and FTP ports are mapped to an ILB VIP.
Instance size for the front-end pool.  Maps to P2,P3,P4.
Number of instances in the front-end pool.  Minimum of two.
Instance size for worker pool one.  Maps to P1,P2,P3,P4.
Number of instances in worker pool one.  Minimum of two.
Instance size for worker pool two.  Maps to P1,P2,P3,P4.
Number of instances in worker pool two.  Can be zero if not using worker pool two.
Instance size for worker pool three.  Maps to P1,P2,P3,P4.
Number of instances in worker pool three.  Can be zero if not using worker pool three.
Defines the number of workers from the worker pool that will be used by the app service plan.
Defines which worker pool's (WP1, WP2 or WP3) resources will be used for the app service plan.
